name: Salary Man Champ Tatakau Salary man
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

In "Salary Man Champ", the stressful and repetitive salary man life is transformed into a party game for everyone to enjoy. Includes 27 types of blow-after-blow and quiz mini games. Please do give them a go.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
